name: Orichalcos Shunoros
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Orichalcos Kyutora", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Orichalcos Aristeros" and 1 "Orichalcos Dexia" from your hand and/or Deck. This card's ATK becomes equal to the total amount of battle damage reduced to 0 by the effect of the "Orichalcos Kyutora" that Summoned this card. If this card battles an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: This card loses ATK equal to either the ATK or DEF of the opponent's monster, depending on the battle position of that monster. If this card on the field is destroyed while it has 0 ATK, and you have 10,000 or more LP: Special Summon 1 "Divine Serpent Geh" from your hand or Deck.
